description:
Garekki and Goldwolf attack Jennifer`s village. Meanwhile, Temjina, who was about to be executed for letting Yuria escape, is set free.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akutoudomo! Shi e no Katamichikippu o Youishiro!!
Villains! Have Your One-Way Ticket to Death!!
悪党ども! 死への片道切符を用意しろ!!
